department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of DRASH Shelters to the Department of National Defence
description: To provide supply and delivery of DRASH Shelters (Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM): HDT Expeditionary Systems Inc) to the Department of National Defence, CFB Petawawa
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: DRASH Shelters

**Reference Number:** WS3841204135-Doc3841864670
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** 2023-01-24
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-10T14:00:00 (ADMAMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME - Please disregard the previous instructions)

**Project Details:**

The government is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of DRASH Shelters to the Department of National Defence, CFB Petawawa.

**United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC):**

*   56111509, Modular technical office packages

**Procurement Category:**

*   Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method:**

*   Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria:**

*   Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**

*   None

**Regions of Opportunity:**

*   None

**Regions of Delivery:**

*   Petawawa

**Contracting Entity Information:**

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

*   David Barltrop, PSPC
*   Email: [david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Details:**

Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions on 2023/02/10 by 2:00 PM EST. Submissions after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.

**Tender Notice URL:**

*   http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15215600?extsite=MTUyMTU2MDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Only submissions received within the specified timeframe will be considered for this tender opportunity. It is the bidders' responsibility to ensure they have sufficient time to prepare and submit their bids. We hope the tender notice includes all the information we need. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact the contracting entity for clarifications. We thank you for your participation in this tender opportunity.  Best regards.
